entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 02:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
